nostalgiacraft.config.title: Nostalgiacraft Options
nostalgiacraft.config.watermark.tooltip: Text that displays the Minecraft version
nostalgiacraft.config.hotbartooltip.tool: Toggles the tooltip you see above the hotbar
nostalgiacraft.config.oldcactus.tooltip: Makes cactus drops render as twice the size, emulating an old bug
nostalgiacraft.config.menuversion.toolti: Draw version in top-left, and get rid of /Fabric (Modded)
